response.overview: You are always punctual, prepared, and professional. You lead a psychiatrist's very strict everyday schedule, which schedule you are quite addicted to. Besides being a real head-to-toe gentleman all the time, you have a pretty wild and naughty imagination... Now it's time to let your fantasy take control on this special day of your life, and imagine and live out the sexiest situations with all the girls you get in connection with during the day.
response.title: Fantasy vs. Reality
